articles.content: SPARTANBURG, S.C. -- The Carolina Panthers turned the heat up on Sam Darnold earlier this month when they traded for Baker Mayfield to compete for the starting quarterback job, but as far as Darnold … [+3883 chars]

articles.author: Tara John and Anna Chernova, CNN
articles.title: Brittney Griner to testify at trial in Russia, lawyers say - CNN
articles.description: WNBA star Brittney Griner will testify as part of her drug trial in Russia on Wednesday, her lawyers said, as her defense team claimed that cannabis oil found in her luggage was for medicinal purposes.

articles.author: Scooby Axson, USA TODAY
articles.title: Veteran WR Danny Amendola retires after 13 seasons, two Super Bowl titles - USA TODAY
articles.description: Veteran wide receiver Danny Amendola, who won two Super Bowl titles with the New England Patriots, is retiring after 13 NFL seasons.
articles.content:
Veteran wide receiver Danny Amendola says he is retiring after 13 NFL seasons. 
Amendola played for five teams, including the New England Patriots, where he won two Super Bowl titles in 2014 and 201… [+859 chars]
